verbose_text: Since the balance between pro apoptotic (Bax) and anti-apoptotic (Bcl-2) members of the Bcl-2 family of intracellular proteins serves as a rheostat to determine the susceptibility to apoptosis, and because autophagy might actually protect tumour cells from apoptosis by modulating the expression of Bcl-2 family members and preventing the pro apoptotic increase in Bax / Bcl-2 ratio, we investigated the role of chloroquine induced blockade of autophagy flux in modulating the trastuzumab-unresponsive Bax / Bcl-2 ratio in trastuzumab-refractory JIMT-1 xenotumors.
evidence: chloroquine-induced blockade of autophagy flux in modulating the trastuzumab-unresponsive Bax
